name: land use change, paddy rice | land use change, paddy rice | Cutoff, U
description:
ecoQuery: https://ecoquery.ecoinvent.org/3.10/cutoff/dataset/15370/documentation

This dataset represents the impacts associated to 1 ha of land use change (LUC), split between change from annual cropland, perennial cropland, primary forest, secondary forest and grassland. This dataset is specific to the country and to paddy rice.;The dataset further includes the (management practice specific) occupation impacts, i.e. the loss of soil organic carbon (SOC), methane (CH4), nitrous oxide (N2O) and, when relevant, peat oxidation.

The activity starts with the consolidation of the country specific land use changes: land transformation from primary forest, secondary forest, existing annual cropland and existing perennial cropland, to paddy rice.

Included processes: land use changes (in kg NPP0), C and N emissions due to soil occupation (i.e. SOC change and emissions from peat oxidation by drainage. 
This activity ends with the addition of land occupation-related inputs and emissions (C in soil or biomass, CO2 from air, gross energy, CO2 to air, CH4 to air and N2O to air)
category: A:Agriculture, forestry and fishing/01:Crop and animal production, hunting and related service activities/016:Support activities to agriculture and post-harvest crop activities/0161:Support activities for crop production

processDocumentation.samplingDescription:
Data are based on 2nd edition of the Quantis-modified tool developed by Blonk Consultants 'WFLDB-adapted-Blonk 2014 direct-land-use-change-assessment-tool_2015-05-18a.xlsx'. 
 The amount of this process to take into account as input to the crop inventory is dependent on the portion of LUC allocated to the specific crop in the country considered. This allocation is also calculated using the 2nd edition of the Quantis-modified tool developed by Blonk Consultants, based on FAO data. 
For further information see WFLDB Methodological Guidelines for the Life Cycle Inventory of Agricultural Products version 3.0, available at: (Report section: https://v30.ecoquery.ecoinvent.org/File/Reports).

exchanges.description: Yield = 1.0 kg/haActivities related land use change of paddy rice cultivation, including clear-cutting (of grassland, primary forest and secondary forest), land already in use and emissions due to soil occupation
